00062 #define REPLACE_T       1
00063 #define REPLACE_E       2
00064 #define REPLACE_N       3
00065 #define REPLACE_TT      4
00066 #define REPLACE_TE      5

00076 /* Data structure to store the information on each node. It keeps the
00077 ** number of minterms of the function rooted at this node in terms of
00078 ** the number of variables specified by the user; the number of
00079 ** minterms of the complement; the impact of the number of minterms of
00080 ** this function on the number of minterms of the root function; the
00081 ** reference count of the node from within the root function; the
00082 ** reference count of the node from an internal node; and the flag
00083 ** that says whether the node should be replaced by a constant 0. */
00084 typedef struct NodeData {
00085     double mintermsP;           /* minterms for the regular node */
00086     double mintermsN;           /* minterms for the complemented node */
00087     int functionRef;            /* references from within this function */
00088     short int replace;          /* TRUE: replace; FLASE: don't replace */
00089     short int parity;           /* 1: even; 2: odd; 3: both */
00090     DdNode *resultP;            /* result for even parity */
00091     DdNode *resultN;            /* result for odd parity */
00092 } NodeData;
00093 
00094 typedef struct ApproxInfo {
00095     DdNode *one;                /* one constant */
00096     DdNode *zero;               /* BDD zero constant */
00097     NodeData *page;             /* per-node information */
00098     st_table *table;            /* hash table to access the per-node info */
00099     int index;                  /* index of the current node */
00100     double max;                 /* max number of minterms */
00101     int size;                   /* how many nodes are left */
00102     double minterms;            /* how many minterms are left */
00103 } ApproxInfo;
00104 
00105 /* Item of the queue used in the levelized traversal of the BDD. */
00106 #ifdef __osf__
00107 #pragma pointer_size save
00108 #pragma pointer_size short
00109 #endif
00110 typedef struct GlobalQueueItem {
00111     struct GlobalQueueItem *next;
00112     struct GlobalQueueItem *cnext;
00113     DdNode *node;
00114     double impactP;
00115     double impactN;
00116 } GlobalQueueItem;
00117  
00118 typedef struct LocalQueueItem {
00119     struct LocalQueueItem *next;
00120     struct LocalQueueItem *cnext;
00121     DdNode *node;
00122     int localRef;
00123 } LocalQueueItem;
00124 #ifdef __osf__
00125 #pragma pointer_size restore
00126 #endif

00188 DdNode *
00189 Cudd_UnderApprox(
00190   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00191   DdNode * f /* function to be subset */,
00192   int  numVars /* number of variables in the support of f */,
00193   int  threshold /* when to stop approximation */,
00194   int  safe /* enforce safe approximation */,
00195   double  quality /* minimum improvement for accepted changes */)
00196 {
00197     DdNode *subset;
00198 
00199     do {
00200         dd->reordered = 0;
00201         subset = cuddUnderApprox(dd, f, numVars, threshold, safe, quality);
00202     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00203 
00204     return(subset);
00205 
00206 } /* end of Cudd_UnderApprox */

00235 DdNode *
00236 Cudd_OverApprox(
00237   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00238   DdNode * f /* function to be superset */,
00239   int  numVars /* number of variables in the support of f */,
00240   int  threshold /* when to stop approximation */,
00241   int  safe /* enforce safe approximation */,
00242   double  quality /* minimum improvement for accepted changes */)
00243 {
00244     DdNode *subset, *g;
00245 
00246     g = Cudd_Not(f);    
00247     do {
00248         dd->reordered = 0;
00249         subset = cuddUnderApprox(dd, g, numVars, threshold, safe, quality);
00250     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00251     
00252     return(Cudd_NotCond(subset, (subset != NULL)));
00253     
00254 } /* end of Cudd_OverApprox */

00350 
00370 DdNode *
00371 cuddUnderApprox(
00372   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
00373   DdNode * f /* current DD */,
00374   int  numVars /* maximum number of variables */,
00375   int  threshold /* threshold under which approximation stops */,
00376   int  safe /* enforce safe approximation */,
00377   double  quality /* minimum improvement for accepted changes */)
00378 {
00379     ApproxInfo *info;
00380     DdNode *subset;
00381     int result;
00382 
00383     if (f == NULL) {
00384         fprintf(stdout, "Cannot subset, nil object\n");
00385         return(NULL);
00386     }
00387 
00388     if (Cudd_IsConstant(f)) {
00389         return(f);
00390     }
00391 
00392     /* Create table where node data are accessible via a hash table. */
00393     info = gatherInfo(dd, f, numVars, safe);
00394     if (info == NULL) {
00395         (void) fprintf(stdout, "Out-of-memory; Cannot subset\n");
00396         return(NULL);
00397     }
00398 
00399     /* Mark nodes that should be replaced by zero. */
00400     result = UAmarkNodes(dd, f, info, threshold, safe, quality);
00401     if (result == 0) {
00402         (void) fprintf(stdout, "Out-of-memory; Cannot subset\n");
00403         FREE(info->page);
00404         st_free_table(info->table);
00405         FREE(info);
00406         return(NULL);
00407     }
00408 
00409     /* Build the result. */
00410     subset = UAbuildSubset(dd, f, info);
00411 #if 1
00412     if (subset && info->size < Cudd_DagSize(subset))
00413         (void) fprintf(stdout, "Wrong prediction: %d versus actual %d\n",
00414                        info->size, Cudd_DagSize(subset));
00415 #endif
00416     FREE(info->page);
00417     st_free_table(info->table);
00418     FREE(info);
00419 
00420 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00421     if (subset != NULL) {
00422         cuddRef(subset);
00423 #if 0
00424         (void) Cudd_DebugCheck(dd);
00425         (void) Cudd_CheckKeys(dd);
00426 #endif
00427         if (!Cudd_bddLeq(dd, subset, f)) {
00428             (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong subset\n");
00429         }
00430         cuddDeref(subset);
00431     }
00432 #endif
00433     return(subset);
00434 
00435 } /* end of cuddUnderApprox */
00436

00457 DdNode *
00458 cuddRemapUnderApprox(
00459   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
00460   DdNode * f /* current DD */,
00461   int  numVars /* maximum number of variables */,
00462   int  threshold /* threshold under which approximation stops */,
00463   double  quality /* minimum improvement for accepted changes */)
00464 {
00465     ApproxInfo *info;
00466     DdNode *subset;
00467     int result;
00468 
00469     if (f == NULL) {
00470         fprintf(stdout, "Cannot subset, nil object\n");
00471         return(NULL);
00472     }
00473 
00474     if (Cudd_IsConstant(f)) {
00475         return(f);
00476     }
00477 
00478     /* Create table where node data are accessible via a hash table. */
00479     info = gatherInfo(dd, f, numVars, TRUE);
00480     if (info == NULL) {
00481         (void) fprintf(stdout, "Out-of-memory; Cannot subset\n");
00482         return(NULL);
00483     }
00484 
00485     /* Mark nodes that should be replaced by zero. */
00486     result = RAmarkNodes(dd, f, info, threshold, quality);
00487     if (result == 0) {
00488         (void) fprintf(stdout, "Out-of-memory; Cannot subset\n");
00489         FREE(info->page);
00490         st_free_table(info->table);
00491         FREE(info);
00492         return(NULL);
00493     }
00494 
00495     /* Build the result. */
00496     subset = RAbuildSubset(dd, f, info);
00497 #if 1
00498     if (subset && info->size < Cudd_DagSize(subset))
00499         (void) fprintf(stdout, "Wrong prediction: %d versus actual %d\n",
00500                        info->size, Cudd_DagSize(subset));
00501 #endif
00502     FREE(info->page);
00503     st_free_table(info->table);
00504     FREE(info);
00505 
00506 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00507     if (subset != NULL) {
00508         cuddRef(subset);
00509 #if 0
00510         (void) Cudd_DebugCheck(dd);
00511         (void) Cudd_CheckKeys(dd);
00512 #endif
00513         if (!Cudd_bddLeq(dd, subset, f)) {
00514             (void) fprintf(stderr, "Wrong subset\n");
00515         }
00516         cuddDeref(subset);
00517     }
00518 #endif
00519     return(subset);
00520 
00521 } /* end of cuddRemapUnderApprox */

00528 
00541 static void
00542 updateParity(
00543   DdNode * node /* function to analyze */,
00544   ApproxInfo * info /* info on BDD */,
00545   int  newparity /* new parity for node */)
00546 {
00547     NodeData *infoN;
00548     DdNode *E;
00549 
00550     if (!st_lookup(info->table, (char *)node, (char **)&infoN)) return;
00551     if ((infoN->parity & newparity) != 0) return;
00552     infoN->parity |= newparity;
00553     if (Cudd_IsConstant(node)) return;
00554     updateParity(cuddT(node),info,newparity);
00555     E = cuddE(node);
00556     if (Cudd_IsComplement(E)) {
00557         updateParity(Cudd_Not(E),info,3-newparity);
00558     } else {
00559         updateParity(E,info,newparity);
00560     }
00561     return;
00562 
00563 } /* end of updateParity */
00564 
00565 
00583 static NodeData *
00584 gatherInfoAux(
00585   DdNode * node /* function to analyze */,
00586   ApproxInfo * info /* info on BDD */,
00587   int  parity /* gather parity information */)
00588 {
00589     DdNode      *N, *Nt, *Ne;
00590     NodeData    *infoN, *infoT, *infoE;
00591 
00592     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
00593 
00594     /* Check whether entry for this node exists. */
00595     if (st_lookup(info->table, (char *)N, (char **)&infoN)) {
00596         if (parity) {
00597             /* Update parity and propagate. */
00598             updateParity(N, info, 1 +  (int) Cudd_IsComplement(node));
00599         }
00600         return(infoN);
00601     }
00602 
00603     /* Compute the cofactors. */
00604     Nt = Cudd_NotCond(cuddT(N), N != node);
00605     Ne = Cudd_NotCond(cuddE(N), N != node);
00606 
00607     infoT = gatherInfoAux(Nt, info, parity);
00608     if (infoT == NULL) return(NULL);
00609     infoE = gatherInfoAux(Ne, info, parity);
00610     if (infoE == NULL) return(NULL);
00611 
00612     infoT->functionRef++;
00613     infoE->functionRef++;
00614 
00615     /* Point to the correct location in the page. */
00616     infoN = &(info->page[info->index++]);
00617     infoN->parity |= 1 + (short) Cudd_IsComplement(node);
00618 
00619     infoN->mintermsP = infoT->mintermsP/2;
00620     infoN->mintermsN = infoT->mintermsN/2;
00621     if (Cudd_IsComplement(Ne) ^ Cudd_IsComplement(node)) {
00622         infoN->mintermsP += infoE->mintermsN/2;
00623         infoN->mintermsN += infoE->mintermsP/2;
00624     } else {
00625         infoN->mintermsP += infoE->mintermsP/2;
00626         infoN->mintermsN += infoE->mintermsN/2;
00627     }
00628 
00629     /* Insert entry for the node in the table. */
00630     if (st_insert(info->table,(char *)N, (char *)infoN) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00631         return(NULL);
00632     }
00633     return(infoN);
00634 
00635 } /* end of gatherInfoAux */
00636 
00637 
00653 static ApproxInfo *
00654 gatherInfo(
00655   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00656   DdNode * node /* function to be analyzed */,
00657   int  numVars /* number of variables node depends on */,
00658   int  parity /* gather parity information */)
00659 {
00660     ApproxInfo  *info;
00661     NodeData *infoTop;
00662 
00663     /* If user did not give numVars value, set it to the maximum
00664     ** exponent that the pow function can take. The -1 is due to the
00665     ** discrepancy in the value that pow takes and the value that
00666     ** log gives.
00667     */
00668     if (numVars == 0) {
00669         numVars = DBL_MAX_EXP - 1;
00670     }
00671 
00672     info = ALLOC(ApproxInfo,1);
00673     if (info == NULL) {
00674         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00675         return(NULL);
00676     }
00677     info->max = pow(2.0,(double) numVars);
00678     info->one = DD_ONE(dd);
00679     info->zero = Cudd_Not(info->one);
00680     info->size = Cudd_DagSize(node);
00681     /* All the information gathered will be stored in a contiguous
00682     ** piece of memory, which is allocated here. This can be done
00683     ** efficiently because we have counted the number of nodes of the
00684     ** BDD. info->index points to the next available entry in the array
00685     ** that stores the per-node information. */
00686     info->page = ALLOC(NodeData,info->size);
00687     if (info->page == NULL) {
00688         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00689         FREE(info);
00690         return(NULL);
00691     }
00692     memset(info->page, 0, info->size * sizeof(NodeData)); /* clear all page */
00693     info->table = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp,st_ptrhash);
00694     if (info->table == NULL) {
00695         FREE(info->page);
00696         FREE(info);
00697         return(NULL);
00698     }
00699     /* We visit the DAG in post-order DFS. Hence, the constant node is
00700     ** in first position, and the root of the DAG is in last position. */
00701 
00702     /* Info for the constant node: Initialize only fields different from 0. */
00703     if (st_insert(info->table, (char *)info->one, (char *)info->page) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00704         FREE(info->page);
00705         FREE(info);
00706         st_free_table(info->table);
00707         return(NULL);
00708     }
00709     info->page[0].mintermsP = info->max;
00710     info->index = 1;
00711 
00712     infoTop = gatherInfoAux(node,info,parity);
00713     if (infoTop == NULL) {
00714         FREE(info->page);
00715         st_free_table(info->table);
00716         FREE(info);
00717         return(NULL);
00718     }
00719     if (Cudd_IsComplement(node)) {
00720         info->minterms = infoTop->mintermsN;
00721     } else {
00722         info->minterms = infoTop->mintermsP;
00723     }
00724 
00725     infoTop->functionRef = 1;
00726     return(info);
00727 
00728 } /* end of gatherInfo */
00729 
00730 
00747 static int
00748 computeSavings(
00749   DdManager * dd,
00750   DdNode * f,
00751   DdNode * skip,
00752   ApproxInfo * info,
00753   DdLevelQueue * queue)
00754 {
00755     NodeData *infoN;
00756     LocalQueueItem *item;
00757     DdNode *node;
00758     int savings = 0;
00759 
00760     node = Cudd_Regular(f);
00761     skip = Cudd_Regular(skip);
00762     /* Insert the given node in the level queue. Its local reference
00763     ** count is set equal to the function reference count so that the
00764     ** search will continue from it when it is retrieved. */
00765     item = (LocalQueueItem *)
00766         cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,node,cuddI(dd,node->index));
00767     if (item == NULL)
00768         return(0);
00769     (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)node, (char **)&infoN);
00770     item->localRef = infoN->functionRef;
00771 
00772     /* Process the queue. */
00773     while (queue->first != NULL) {
00774         item = (LocalQueueItem *) queue->first;
00775         node = item->node;
00776         cuddLevelQueueDequeue(queue,cuddI(dd,node->index));
00777         if (node == skip) continue;
00778         (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)node, (char **)&infoN);
00779         if (item->localRef != infoN->functionRef) {
00780             /* This node is shared. */
00781             continue;
00782         }
00783         savings++;
00784         if (!Cudd_IsConstant(cuddT(node))) {
00785             item = (LocalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,cuddT(node),
00786                                          cuddI(dd,cuddT(node)->index));
00787             if (item == NULL) return(0);
00788             item->localRef++;
00789         }
00790         if (!Cudd_IsConstant(cuddE(node))) {
00791             item = (LocalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node)),
00792                                          cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node))->index));
00793             if (item == NULL) return(0);
00794             item->localRef++;
00795         }
00796     }
00797 
00798 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00799     /* At the end of a local search the queue should be empty. */
00800     assert(queue->size == 0);
00801 #endif
00802     return(savings);
00803 
00804 } /* end of computeSavings */
00805 
00806 
00819 static int
00820 updateRefs(
00821   DdManager * dd,
00822   DdNode * f,
00823   DdNode * skip,
00824   ApproxInfo * info,
00825   DdLevelQueue * queue)
00826 {
00827     NodeData *infoN;
00828     LocalQueueItem *item;
00829     DdNode *node;
00830     int savings = 0;
00831 
00832     node = Cudd_Regular(f);
00833     /* Insert the given node in the level queue. Its function reference
00834     ** count is set equal to 0 so that the search will continue from it
00835     ** when it is retrieved. */
00836     item = (LocalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,node,cuddI(dd,node->index));
00837     if (item == NULL)
00838         return(0);
00839     (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)node, (char **)&infoN);
00840     infoN->functionRef = 0;
00841 
00842     if (skip != NULL) {
00843         /* Increase the function reference count of the node to be skipped
00844         ** by 1 to account for the node pointing to it that will be created. */
00845         skip = Cudd_Regular(skip);
00846         (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)skip, (char **)&infoN);
00847         infoN->functionRef++;
00848     }
00849 
00850     /* Process the queue. */
00851     while (queue->first != NULL) {
00852         item = (LocalQueueItem *) queue->first;
00853         node = item->node;
00854         cuddLevelQueueDequeue(queue,cuddI(dd,node->index));
00855         (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)node, (char **)&infoN);
00856         if (infoN->functionRef != 0) {
00857             /* This node is shared or must be skipped. */
00858             continue;
00859         }
00860         savings++;
00861         if (!Cudd_IsConstant(cuddT(node))) {
00862             item = (LocalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,cuddT(node),
00863                                          cuddI(dd,cuddT(node)->index));
00864             if (item == NULL) return(0);
00865             (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)cuddT(node),
00866                              (char **)&infoN);
00867             infoN->functionRef--;
00868         }
00869         if (!Cudd_IsConstant(cuddE(node))) {
00870             item = (LocalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node)),
00871                                          cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node))->index));
00872             if (item == NULL) return(0);
00873             (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node)),
00874                              (char **)&infoN);
00875             infoN->functionRef--;
00876         }
00877     }
00878 
00879 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00880     /* At the end of a local search the queue should be empty. */
00881     assert(queue->size == 0);
00882 #endif
00883     return(savings);
00884 
00885 } /* end of updateRefs */
00886 
00887 
00900 static int
00901 UAmarkNodes(
00902   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00903   DdNode * f /* function to be analyzed */,
00904   ApproxInfo * info /* info on BDD */,
00905   int  threshold /* when to stop approximating */,
00906   int  safe /* enforce safe approximation */,
00907   double  quality /* minimum improvement for accepted changes */)
00908 {
00909     DdLevelQueue *queue;
00910     DdLevelQueue *localQueue;
00911     NodeData *infoN;
00912     GlobalQueueItem *item;
00913     DdNode *node;
00914     double numOnset;
00915     double impactP, impactN;
00916     int savings;
00917 
00918 #if 0
00919     (void) printf("initial size = %d initial minterms = %g\n",
00920                   info->size, info->minterms);
00921 #endif
00922     queue = cuddLevelQueueInit(dd->size,sizeof(GlobalQueueItem),info->size);
00923     if (queue == NULL) {
00924         return(0);
00925     }
00926     localQueue = cuddLevelQueueInit(dd->size,sizeof(LocalQueueItem),
00927                                     CUDD_UNIQUE_SLOTS);
00928     if (localQueue == NULL) {
00929         cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
00930         return(0);
00931     }
00932     node = Cudd_Regular(f);
00933     item = (GlobalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,node,cuddI(dd,node->index));
00934     if (item == NULL) {
00935         cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
00936         cuddLevelQueueQuit(localQueue);
00937         return(0);
00938     }
00939     if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) {
00940         item->impactP = 0.0;
00941         item->impactN = 1.0;
00942     } else {
00943         item->impactP = 1.0;
00944         item->impactN = 0.0;
00945     }
00946     while (queue->first != NULL) {
00947         /* If the size of the subset is below the threshold, quit. */
00948         if (info->size <= threshold)
00949             break;
00950         item = (GlobalQueueItem *) queue->first;
00951         node = item->node;
00952         node = Cudd_Regular(node);
00953         (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)node, (char **)&infoN);
00954         if (safe && infoN->parity == 3) {
00955             cuddLevelQueueDequeue(queue,cuddI(dd,node->index));
00956             continue;
00957         }
00958         impactP = item->impactP;
00959         impactN = item->impactN;
00960         numOnset = infoN->mintermsP * impactP + infoN->mintermsN * impactN;
00961         savings = computeSavings(dd,node,NULL,info,localQueue);
00962         if (savings == 0) {
00963             cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
00964             cuddLevelQueueQuit(localQueue);
00965             return(0);
00966         }
00967         cuddLevelQueueDequeue(queue,cuddI(dd,node->index));
00968 #if 0
00969         (void) printf("node %p: impact = %g/%g numOnset = %g savings %d\n",
00970                       node, impactP, impactN, numOnset, savings);
00971 #endif
00972         if ((1 - numOnset / info->minterms) >
00973             quality * (1 - (double) savings / info->size)) {
00974             infoN->replace = TRUE;
00975             info->size -= savings;
00976             info->minterms -=numOnset;
00977 #if 0
00978             (void) printf("replace: new size = %d new minterms = %g\n",
00979                           info->size, info->minterms);
00980 #endif
00981             savings -= updateRefs(dd,node,NULL,info,localQueue);
00982             assert(savings == 0);
00983             continue;
00984         }
00985         if (!Cudd_IsConstant(cuddT(node))) {
00986             item = (GlobalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,cuddT(node),
00987                                          cuddI(dd,cuddT(node)->index));
00988             item->impactP += impactP/2.0;
00989             item->impactN += impactN/2.0;
00990         }
00991         if (!Cudd_IsConstant(cuddE(node))) {
00992             item = (GlobalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node)),
00993                                          cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node))->index));
00994             if (Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(node))) {
00995                 item->impactP += impactN/2.0;
00996                 item->impactN += impactP/2.0;
00997             } else {
00998                 item->impactP += impactP/2.0;
00999                 item->impactN += impactN/2.0;
01000             }
01001         }
01002     }
01003 
01004     cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
01005     cuddLevelQueueQuit(localQueue);
01006     return(1);
01007 
01008 } /* end of UAmarkNodes */
01009 
01010 
01024 static DdNode *
01025 UAbuildSubset(
01026   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
01027   DdNode * node /* current node */,
01028   ApproxInfo * info /* node info */)
01029 {
01030 
01031     DdNode *Nt, *Ne, *N, *t, *e, *r;
01032     NodeData *infoN;
01033 
01034     if (Cudd_IsConstant(node))
01035         return(node);
01036 
01037     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
01038 
01039     if (st_lookup(info->table, (char *)N, (char **)&infoN)) {
01040         if (infoN->replace == TRUE) {
01041             return(info->zero);
01042         }
01043         if (N == node ) {
01044             if (infoN->resultP != NULL) {
01045                 return(infoN->resultP);
01046             }
01047         } else {
01048             if (infoN->resultN != NULL) {
01049                 return(infoN->resultN);
01050             }
01051         }
01052     } else {
01053         (void) fprintf(stdout, "Something is wrong, ought to be in info table\n");
01054         return(NULL);
01055     }
01056 
01057     Nt = Cudd_NotCond(cuddT(N), Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01058     Ne = Cudd_NotCond(cuddE(N), Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01059 
01060     t = UAbuildSubset(dd, Nt, info);
01061     if (t == NULL) {
01062         return(NULL);
01063     }
01064     cuddRef(t);
01065 
01066     e = UAbuildSubset(dd, Ne, info);
01067     if (e == NULL) {
01068         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,t);
01069         return(NULL);
01070     }
01071     cuddRef(e);
01072 
01073     if (Cudd_IsComplement(t)) {
01074         t = Cudd_Not(t);
01075         e = Cudd_Not(e);
01076         r = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd, N->index, t, e);
01077         if (r == NULL) {
01078             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
01079             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
01080             return(NULL);
01081         }
01082         r = Cudd_Not(r);
01083     } else {
01084         r = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd, N->index, t, e);
01085         if (r == NULL) {
01086             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
01087             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
01088             return(NULL);
01089         }
01090     }
01091     cuddDeref(t);
01092     cuddDeref(e);
01093 
01094     if (N == node) {
01095         infoN->resultP = r;
01096     } else {
01097         infoN->resultN = r;
01098     }
01099 
01100     return(r);
01101 
01102 } /* end of UAbuildSubset */
01103 
01104 
01117 static int
01118 RAmarkNodes(
01119   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
01120   DdNode * f /* function to be analyzed */,
01121   ApproxInfo * info /* info on BDD */,
01122   int  threshold /* when to stop approximating */,
01123   double  quality /* minimum improvement for accepted changes */)
01124 {
01125     DdLevelQueue *queue;
01126     DdLevelQueue *localQueue;
01127     NodeData *infoN, *infoT, *infoE;
01128     GlobalQueueItem *item;
01129     DdNode *node, *T, *E;
01130     DdNode *shared; /* grandchild shared by the two children of node */
01131     double numOnset;
01132     double impact, impactP, impactN;
01133     double minterms;
01134     int savings;
01135     int replace;
01136 
01137 #if 0
01138     (void) printf("initial size = %d initial minterms = %g\n",
01139                   info->size, info->minterms);
01140 #endif
01141     queue = cuddLevelQueueInit(dd->size,sizeof(GlobalQueueItem),info->size);
01142     if (queue == NULL) {
01143         return(0);
01144     }
01145     localQueue = cuddLevelQueueInit(dd->size,sizeof(LocalQueueItem),
01146                                     CUDD_UNIQUE_SLOTS);
01147     if (localQueue == NULL) {
01148         cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
01149         return(0);
01150     }
01151     /* Enqueue regular pointer to root and initialize impact. */
01152     node = Cudd_Regular(f);
01153     item = (GlobalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,node,cuddI(dd,node->index));
01154     if (item == NULL) {
01155         cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
01156         cuddLevelQueueQuit(localQueue);
01157         return(0);
01158     }
01159     if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) {
01160         item->impactP = 0.0;
01161         item->impactN = 1.0;
01162     } else {
01163         item->impactP = 1.0;
01164         item->impactN = 0.0;
01165     }
01166     /* The nodes retrieved here are guaranteed to be non-terminal.
01167     ** The initial node is not terminal because constant nodes are
01168     ** dealt with in the calling procedure. Subsequent nodes are inserted
01169     ** only if they are not terminal. */
01170     while (queue->first != NULL) {
01171         /* If the size of the subset is below the threshold, quit. */
01172         if (info->size <= threshold)
01173             break;
01174         item = (GlobalQueueItem *) queue->first;
01175         node = item->node;
01176 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01177         assert(item->impactP >= 0 && item->impactP <= 1.0);
01178         assert(item->impactN >= 0 && item->impactN <= 1.0);
01179         assert(!Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01180         assert(!Cudd_IsConstant(node));
01181 #endif
01182         if (!st_lookup(info->table, (char *)node, (char **)&infoN)) {
01183             cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
01184             cuddLevelQueueQuit(localQueue);
01185             return(0);
01186         }
01187 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01188         assert(infoN->parity >= 1 && infoN->parity <= 3);
01189 #endif
01190         if (infoN->parity == 3) {
01191             /* This node can be reached through paths of different parity.
01192             ** It is not safe to replace it, because remapping will give
01193             ** an incorrect result, while replacement by 0 may cause node
01194             ** splitting. */
01195             cuddLevelQueueDequeue(queue,cuddI(dd,node->index));
01196             continue;
01197         }
01198         T = cuddT(node);
01199         E = cuddE(node);
01200         shared = NULL;
01201         impactP = item->impactP;
01202         impactN = item->impactN;
01203         if (Cudd_bddLeq(dd,T,E)) {
01204             /* Here we know that E is regular. */
01205 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01206             assert(!Cudd_IsComplement(E));
01207 #endif
01208             (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)T, (char **)&infoT);
01209             (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)E, (char **)&infoE);
01210             if (infoN->parity == 1) {
01211                 impact = impactP;
01212                 minterms = infoE->mintermsP/2.0 - infoT->mintermsP/2.0;
01213                 if (infoE->functionRef == 1 && !Cudd_IsConstant(E)) {
01214                     savings = 1 + computeSavings(dd,E,NULL,info,localQueue);
01215                     if (savings == 1) {
01216                         cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
01217                         cuddLevelQueueQuit(localQueue);
01218                         return(0);
01219                     }
01220                 } else {
01221                     savings = 1;
01222                 }
01223                 replace = REPLACE_E;
01224             } else {
01225 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01226                 assert(infoN->parity == 2);
01227 #endif
01228                 impact = impactN;
01229                 minterms = infoT->mintermsN/2.0 - infoE->mintermsN/2.0;
01230                 if (infoT->functionRef == 1 && !Cudd_IsConstant(T)) {
01231                     savings = 1 + computeSavings(dd,T,NULL,info,localQueue);
01232                     if (savings == 1) {
01233                         cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
01234                         cuddLevelQueueQuit(localQueue);
01235                         return(0);
01236                     }
01237                 } else {
01238                     savings = 1;
01239                 }
01240                 replace = REPLACE_T;
01241             }
01242             numOnset = impact * minterms;
01243         } else if (Cudd_bddLeq(dd,E,T)) {
01244             /* Here E may be complemented. */
01245             DdNode *Ereg = Cudd_Regular(E);
01246             (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)T, (char **)&infoT);
01247             (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)Ereg, (char **)&infoE);
01248             if (infoN->parity == 1) {
01249                 impact = impactP;
01250                 minterms = infoT->mintermsP/2.0 -
01251                     ((E == Ereg) ? infoE->mintermsP : infoE->mintermsN)/2.0;
01252                 if (infoT->functionRef == 1 && !Cudd_IsConstant(T)) {
01253                     savings = 1 + computeSavings(dd,T,NULL,info,localQueue);
01254                     if (savings == 1) {
01255                         cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
01256                         cuddLevelQueueQuit(localQueue);
01257                         return(0);
01258                     }
01259                 } else {
01260                     savings = 1;
01261                 }
01262                 replace = REPLACE_T;
01263             } else {
01264 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01265                 assert(infoN->parity == 2);
01266 #endif
01267                 impact = impactN;
01268                 minterms = ((E == Ereg) ? infoE->mintermsN :
01269                             infoE->mintermsP)/2.0 - infoT->mintermsN/2.0;
01270                 if (infoE->functionRef == 1 && !Cudd_IsConstant(E)) {
01271                     savings = 1 + computeSavings(dd,E,NULL,info,localQueue);
01272                     if (savings == 1) {
01273                         cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
01274                         cuddLevelQueueQuit(localQueue);
01275                         return(0);
01276                     }
01277                 } else {
01278                     savings = 1;
01279                 }
01280                 replace = REPLACE_E;
01281             }
01282             numOnset = impact * minterms;
01283         } else {
01284             DdNode *Ereg = Cudd_Regular(E);
01285             DdNode *TT = cuddT(T);
01286             DdNode *ET = Cudd_NotCond(cuddT(Ereg), Cudd_IsComplement(E));
01287             if (T->index == Ereg->index && TT == ET) {
01288                 shared = TT;
01289                 replace = REPLACE_TT;
01290             } else {
01291                 DdNode *TE = cuddE(T);
01292                 DdNode *EE = Cudd_NotCond(cuddE(Ereg), Cudd_IsComplement(E));
01293                 if (T->index == Ereg->index && TE == EE) {
01294                     shared = TE;
01295                     replace = REPLACE_TE;
01296                 } else {
01297                     replace = REPLACE_N;
01298                 }
01299             }
01300             numOnset = infoN->mintermsP * impactP + infoN->mintermsN * impactN;
01301             savings = computeSavings(dd,node,shared,info,localQueue);
01302             if (shared != NULL) {
01303                 NodeData *infoS;
01304                 (void) st_lookup(info->table, (char *)Cudd_Regular(shared),
01305                                  (char **)&infoS);
01306                 if (Cudd_IsComplement(shared)) {
01307                     numOnset -= (infoS->mintermsN * impactP +
01308                         infoS->mintermsP * impactN)/2.0;
01309                 } else {
01310                     numOnset -= (infoS->mintermsP * impactP +
01311                         infoS->mintermsN * impactN)/2.0;
01312                 }
01313                 savings--;
01314             }
01315         }
01316 
01317         cuddLevelQueueDequeue(queue,cuddI(dd,node->index));
01318 #if 0
01319         if (replace == REPLACE_T || replace == REPLACE_E)
01320             (void) printf("node %p: impact = %g numOnset = %g savings %d\n",
01321                           node, impact, numOnset, savings);
01322         else
01323             (void) printf("node %p: impact = %g/%g numOnset = %g savings %d\n",
01324                           node, impactP, impactN, numOnset, savings);
01325 #endif
01326         if ((1 - numOnset / info->minterms) >
01327             quality * (1 - (double) savings / info->size)) {
01328             infoN->replace = replace;
01329             info->size -= savings;
01330             info->minterms -=numOnset;
01331 #if 0
01332             (void) printf("remap(%d): new size = %d new minterms = %g\n",
01333                           replace, info->size, info->minterms);
01334 #endif
01335             if (replace == REPLACE_N) {
01336                 savings -= updateRefs(dd,node,NULL,info,localQueue);
01337             } else if (replace == REPLACE_T) {
01338                 savings -= updateRefs(dd,node,E,info,localQueue);
01339             } else if (replace == REPLACE_E) {
01340                 savings -= updateRefs(dd,node,T,info,localQueue);
01341             } else {
01342 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01343                 assert(replace == REPLACE_TT || replace == REPLACE_TE);
01344 #endif
01345                 savings -= updateRefs(dd,node,shared,info,localQueue) - 1;
01346             }
01347             assert(savings == 0);
01348         } else {
01349             replace = NOTHING;
01350         }
01351         if (replace == REPLACE_N) continue;
01352         if ((replace == REPLACE_E || replace == NOTHING) &&
01353             !Cudd_IsConstant(cuddT(node))) {
01354             item = (GlobalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,cuddT(node),
01355                                          cuddI(dd,cuddT(node)->index));
01356             if (replace == REPLACE_E) {
01357                 item->impactP += impactP;
01358                 item->impactN += impactN;
01359             } else {
01360                 item->impactP += impactP/2.0;
01361                 item->impactN += impactN/2.0;
01362             }
01363         }
01364         if ((replace == REPLACE_T || replace == NOTHING) &&
01365             !Cudd_IsConstant(cuddE(node))) {
01366             item = (GlobalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node)),
01367                                          cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(cuddE(node))->index));
01368             if (Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(node))) {
01369                 if (replace == REPLACE_T) {
01370                     item->impactP += impactN;
01371                     item->impactN += impactP;
01372                 } else {
01373                     item->impactP += impactN/2.0;
01374                     item->impactN += impactP/2.0;
01375                 }
01376             } else {
01377                 if (replace == REPLACE_T) {
01378                     item->impactP += impactP;
01379                     item->impactN += impactN;
01380                 } else {
01381                     item->impactP += impactP/2.0;
01382                     item->impactN += impactN/2.0;
01383                 }
01384             }
01385         }
01386         if ((replace == REPLACE_TT || replace == REPLACE_TE) &&
01387             !Cudd_IsConstant(shared)) {
01388             item = (GlobalQueueItem *) cuddLevelQueueEnqueue(queue,Cudd_Regular(shared),
01389                                          cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(shared)->index));
01390             if (Cudd_IsComplement(shared)) {
01391                 if (replace == REPLACE_T) {
01392                     item->impactP += impactN;
01393                     item->impactN += impactP;
01394                 } else {
01395                     item->impactP += impactN/2.0;
01396                     item->impactN += impactP/2.0;
01397                 }
01398             } else {
01399                 if (replace == REPLACE_T) {
01400                     item->impactP += impactP;
01401                     item->impactN += impactN;
01402                 } else {
01403                     item->impactP += impactP/2.0;
01404                     item->impactN += impactN/2.0;
01405                 }
01406             }
01407         }
01408     }
01409 
01410     cuddLevelQueueQuit(queue);
01411     cuddLevelQueueQuit(localQueue);
01412     return(1);
01413 
01414 } /* end of RAmarkNodes */
01415 
01416 
01431 static DdNode *
01432 RAbuildSubset(
01433   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
01434   DdNode * node /* current node */,
01435   ApproxInfo * info /* node info */)
01436 {
01437     DdNode *Nt, *Ne, *N, *t, *e, *r;
01438     NodeData *infoN;
01439 
01440     if (Cudd_IsConstant(node))
01441         return(node);
01442 
01443     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
01444 
01445     Nt = Cudd_NotCond(cuddT(N), Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01446     Ne = Cudd_NotCond(cuddE(N), Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01447 
01448     if (st_lookup(info->table, (char *)N, (char **)&infoN)) {
01449         if (N == node ) {
01450             if (infoN->resultP != NULL) {
01451                 return(infoN->resultP);
01452             }
01453         } else {
01454             if (infoN->resultN != NULL) {
01455                 return(infoN->resultN);
01456             }
01457         }
01458         if (infoN->replace == REPLACE_T) {
01459             r = RAbuildSubset(dd, Ne, info);
01460             return(r);
01461         } else if (infoN->replace == REPLACE_E) {
01462             r = RAbuildSubset(dd, Nt, info);
01463             return(r);
01464         } else if (infoN->replace == REPLACE_N) {
01465             return(info->zero);
01466         } else if (infoN->replace == REPLACE_TT) {
01467             DdNode *Ntt = Cudd_NotCond(cuddT(cuddT(N)),
01468                                        Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01469             int index = cuddT(N)->index;
01470             DdNode *e = info->zero;
01471             DdNode *t = RAbuildSubset(dd, Ntt, info);
01472             if (t == NULL) {
01473                 return(NULL);
01474             }
01475             cuddRef(t);
01476             if (Cudd_IsComplement(t)) {
01477                 t = Cudd_Not(t);
01478                 e = Cudd_Not(e);
01479                 r = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd, index, t, e);
01480                 if (r == NULL) {
01481                     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
01482                     return(NULL);
01483                 }
01484                 r = Cudd_Not(r);
01485             } else {
01486                 r = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd, index, t, e);
01487                 if (r == NULL) {
01488                     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
01489                     return(NULL);
01490                 }
01491             }
01492             cuddDeref(t);
01493             return(r);
01494         } else if (infoN->replace == REPLACE_TE) {
01495             DdNode *Nte = Cudd_NotCond(cuddE(cuddT(N)),
01496                                        Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01497             int index = cuddT(N)->index;
01498             DdNode *t = info->one;
01499             DdNode *e = RAbuildSubset(dd, Nte, info);
01500             if (e == NULL) {
01501                 return(NULL);
01502             }
01503             cuddRef(e);
01504             e = Cudd_Not(e);
01505             r = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd, index, t, e);
01506             if (r == NULL) {
01507                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
01508                 return(NULL);
01509             }
01510             r =Cudd_Not(r);
01511             cuddDeref(e);
01512             return(r);
01513         }
01514     } else {
01515         (void) fprintf(stdout, "Something is wrong, ought to be in info table\n");
01516         return(NULL);
01517     }
01518 
01519 
01520     t = RAbuildSubset(dd, Nt, info);
01521     if (t == NULL) {
01522         return(NULL);
01523     }
01524     cuddRef(t);
01525 
01526     e = RAbuildSubset(dd, Ne, info);
01527     if (e == NULL) {
01528         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,t);
01529         return(NULL);
01530     }
01531     cuddRef(e);
01532 
01533     if (Cudd_IsComplement(t)) {
01534         t = Cudd_Not(t);
01535         e = Cudd_Not(e);
01536         r = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd, N->index, t, e);
01537         if (r == NULL) {
01538             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
01539             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
01540             return(NULL);
01541         }
01542         r = Cudd_Not(r);
01543     } else {
01544         r = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd, N->index, t, e);
01545         if (r == NULL) {
01546             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
01547             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
01548             return(NULL);
01549         }
01550     }
01551     cuddDeref(t);
01552     cuddDeref(e);
01553 
01554     if (N == node) {
01555         infoN->resultP = r;
01556     } else {
01557         infoN->resultN = r;
01558     }
01559 
01560     return(r);
01561 
01562 } /* end of RAbuildSubset */
